name: Dihydroberberine (GlucoVantage)
description: Active metabolite of berberine with 5x better bioavailability. Allows lower dosing with equivalent or superior glucose-lowering effects and fewer GI side effects. GlucoVantage is the branded form. Ideal for those who can't tolerate standard berberine doses.
mechanisms: AMPK activation (same as berberine, better absorbed)

dosage.notes: 5x better absorbed than berberine â€” use ~1/5 the dose. GlucoVantage brand most studied. Better GI tolerance than berberine. Take with carb-containing meals.

keyFindings: 5x greater bioavailability than standard berberine in pharmacokinetic studies
Equivalent glucose-lowering at fraction of the dose
Significantly fewer GI side effects than standard berberine
sideEffects: Mild GI effects (much less than berberine)
